targets.query: SELECT count("exception") FROM "ALARMING" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/) AND ALARM_TYPE=~/RED.*|TAIL.*/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY "ALARM_TYPE", "LINKNAME", queue_name, queue_id
select sum(cos_fw) from (SELECT "cos_forwarded_octets_rate"*8 as cos_fw FROM "COS" WHERE "device" =~ /^$rtr$/  and $timeFilter GROUP BY LINKNAME,  "queue_id") group by queue_id
SELECT "exception" FROM "ALARMING" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/) AND $timeFilter and ALARM_TYPE=~/RED.*|TAIL.*/ GROUP BY "ALARM_TYPE", "LINKNAME", queue_id, queue_name
SELECT mean("in_octets_rate")*8  FROM "COS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("out_octets_rate")*8 FROM "COS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("in_pkts_rate")*8  FROM "COS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("out_pkts_rate")*8 FROM "COS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("cos_red_dropped_packets_rate") FROM "COS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) and  $timeFilter GROUP BY "queue_id",  time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("cos_tail_dropped_packets_rate") FROM "COS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($sample_interval), "queue_id"
SELECT last("cos_buffer_cur")/last("cos_buffer_size")*100 FROM "COS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) and $timeFilter group by queue_id
SELECT last("cos_buffer_peak")/last("cos_buffer_size")*100 FROM "COS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND  $timeFilter group by queue_id
SELECT "cos_forwarded_octets_rate"*8 FROM "COS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/)  and $timeFilter GROUP BY "queue_id"
SELECT mean("cos_queued_octets_rate")*8 FROM "COS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) and $timeFilter GROUP BY "queue_id", time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("cos_forwarded_octets_rate")*8 FROM "COS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/)  and $timeFilter GROUP BY "queue_id", time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("cos_queued_packets_rate")*8 FROM "COS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/)  and $timeFilter GROUP BY "queue_id", time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("cos_forwarded_packets_rate")*8 FROM "COS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND   $timeFilter GROUP BY "queue_id", time($sample_interval)

list.definition: show tag values FROM COS with key="device"
list.label: Router
list.name: rtr
list.query: show tag values FROM COS with key="device"

list.definition: show tag values FROM COS with key="LINKNAME" where device=~/$rtr/
list.label: Interface
list.name: ifname
list.query: show tag values FROM COS with key="LINKNAME" where device=~/$rtr/
